rows.title::eng: Send this message after your WhatsApp Call
rows.text::eng:
Hi! Thank you for volunteering to lead the group discussions. 

*While engaging with other parents in the group, keep the following in mind*: 

ğŸ‘‹ Greet parents when engaging with them.

ğŸ’› Respect what participants share and be aware of different ages, genders, values and circumstances. 

ğŸ… Encourage parents to share and respond to each other - and praise them for it.

ğŸ”” Remind parents of ground rules when needed.

ğŸ”‘ Model the behaviour you want to see among the parents.

rows.title::eng: When should the group admin respond to messages?
rows.text::eng:
â° Participants may send messages at any time during the week. To keep your workload manageable, you can respond to messages once or twice a day, depending on your schedule. 

ğŸ‘ You can also respond to messages with a relevant emoji or short response when you can.
rows.guidance::eng: Send this message to the group admin volunteers.

rows.text::eng:
Hi!ğŸ˜ƒThank you for your message. 

My role with @global.prog_name was limited. I unfortunately will not be further involved with the programme. 

If your WhatsApp Support group is still active, feel free to post your questions in the group. Other parents may be able to support you with helpful suggestions. ğŸ’¡

Here are some prompts you can use with the parent group: 

ğŸ‰Let us celebrate our successes! What was something positive you experienced when you tried one of the @global.prog_name skills with your child?

ğŸŒ±Trying out new skills can be hard at first. What was something *difficult* that you experienced when you tried a @global.prog_name skill with your child at home?

ğŸ’™You are welcome to use this WhatsApp space to share any questions or experiences you have on your @global.prog_name journey. Remember, I may not always be able to respond, but this is our group â€“ *together we can find all the answers we need*!

Thank you for sharing your thoughts ğŸ’™

Since we donâ€™t have any volunteers for group admin, I will be closing this WhatsApp Support Group at the end of the Programme. 

Remember, you can still continue your @global.prog_name journey with your family!

Hello ğŸ‘‹

Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the programme. Iâ€™m sorry that youâ€™re facing challenges. Here are a couple of things you can try: 

1ï¸âƒ£If thereâ€™s a skill or goal that you are finding difficult, remember you can always go back and rewatch the stories. Practice makes perfect! âœ¨

2ï¸âƒ£If you feel comfortable, please feel free to chat about the areas youâ€™re finding tough with your peers in the WhatsApp Support Group. Your peers might have some helpful tips ğŸ‘

Remember, everyoneâ€™s learning journey is unique, and change takes time. But trust me, if you keep practising the skills youâ€™ve learned, youâ€™ll start to see progress. ğŸ…

Hello ğŸ‘‹

Thank you for sharing your feelings. 
Itâ€™s okay to have fears or feel sad when something youâ€™ve been a part of is ending. 

Remember, 

1ï¸âƒ£Even though @global.prog_name is ending, your journey can continue. You have gained some â­amazing â­parenting skills that you can carry with you. 

2ï¸âƒ£The WhatsApp group can be a source of support well beyond the programme. Keep sharing your success and struggles in the WhatsApp Support Group, or with your peers. 

3ï¸âƒ£If you ever want to go back to any parenting skills or goals, you are review our chats. Practise makes perfect âœ¨

You did great throughout your @global.prog_name journey!

rows.title::eng: Send this reminder message to the group
rows.text::eng:

rows.title::eng: Send this reminder message to the parent who broke the ground rule
rows.text::eng:
Hello â­

ğŸ‘€ Creating a positive environment in our WhatsApp group is important, and that relies on everyone following the ground rules.

ğŸŒ± I believe in the strength of our community. 

However, if difficulties continue, I may have to consider removing you from the group. 

Let's work together to maintain a respectful and supportive atmosphere. 

See you in the next chat session.

rows.title::eng: Send this message to the parent after removing them from the WhatsApp Group
rows.text::eng:
Hello â­

ğŸ‘€ I have noticed despite reminders, the ground rules aren't being followed.

ğŸ’šUnfortunately I have removed you from the WhatsApp group to maintain a positive environment for everyone.
rows.guidance::eng:
Notify your supervisor once you remove them. 

You can block the parent if they continue to reach out to you.

rows.title::eng: Send this message to the group after removing the parent who broke the ground rule
